[vc_row][vc_column]

Auxiliary Equipments

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]At WASHUN Machinery, the blow molding system, injection molding system, and the injection moulds are the main products. In order to provide better service for our customer and based on the many years of experience & know-how in the blow moulding & injection moulding field, cooperating with the famous auxiliary equipments manufacturer, WASHUN Machinery supplies the related auxiliary equipments to build the turn-key project for the customers.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4194″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/air-compressor/”]
Air Compressor
[vc_column_text]Air compressor is the air source for PET stretch blow molding machine. As the main unit of PET production equipment, [More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4195″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/air-dryer/”]
Air Dryer
[vc_column_text]The moisture in atmosphere usually turns on gaseous and hard to detect. After compressed in air compressor and cooled through pipe, [More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4196″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/air-filter/”]
Air Filter
[vc_column_text]Apart from the water, there are also some corrosive impurities like carbon-hydrogen, tiny dust and solid particles, ect. [More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4330″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/water-chiller/”]
Water Chiller
[vc_column_text]Water chiller is designed for cooling the mold to improve the finish of plastic products and reduce the internal stress, [More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4197″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/autoloader/”]
Autoloader
[vc_column_text]Autoloader is used for loading plastic resin into hopper dryer to remove its moisture before being injected into finished products. [More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4202″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/hopper-dryer/”]
Hopper Dryer
[vc_column_text]Hopper dryer is used to eliminate moisture in the plastic material. If the plastic material is put into the injection machine’s barrel without drying, [More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4199″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/cooling-tower/”]
Cooling Tower
[vc_column_text]Cooling tower is the perfect cooling equipment for the plastic production line. It offers sufficient water to cool the water chiller , [More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4201″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/granulator/”]
Granulator
[vc_column_text]Granulator is used to crush the rejected products, like defective PET preform and bottle for reuse. [More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4324″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/mixer/”]
Mixer
[vc_column_text]Mixer is used to mix the crushed reject product with new plastic material or mix the plastic master batch [More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-arrow-circle-up” color=”black” align=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
